doctor.name: Dr. Nahida Islam Nipa
doctor.specialty: Skin, Allergy, Hair, Nail, Sexual Diseases Specialist & Dermato Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Nahida Islam Nipa is a Dermatologist in Mymensingh. Her qualification is MBBS (DU), DDV (DU), FRCP (Glasgow), MACP (USA). She is a Associate Professor & Head (Dermatology) at Community Based Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Delta Health Care, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Nahida Islam Nipa at Delta Health Care, Mymensingh is 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.degree: MBBS (Dhaka), DDV (BSMMU), FCPS (Skin & Sex), MCPS (Skin & Sex)
doctor.specialty: Skin, Allergy, Leprosy & Sexual Diseases Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Nazrul Islam is a Dermatologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), DDV (BSMMU), FCPS (Skin & Sex), MCPS (Skin & Sex). He is a Senior Consultant, Dermatology & Venereology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Pranto Specialized Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Nazrul Islam at Pranto Specialized Hospital, Mymensingh is Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour.

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Fashiur Rahman
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Fashiur Rahman is a Dermatologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS, DDV, MD. He is a Professor & Head, Dermatology & Venereology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Fashiur Rahman at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 12pm to 8pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Susthir Sarker Apu
doctor.specialty: Skin & Sexual Diseases Specialist & Cosmetic Dermatosurgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Susthir Sarker Apu is a Dermatologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, DDV (DU), FCPS (Skin & Sex), CCD (BIRDEM). He is a Consultant, Dermatology & Venereology at Community Based Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sayem Diagno Complex & Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Susthir Sarker Apu at Sayem Diagno Complex & Hospital, Mymensingh is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday).
